asap.realizer

Interface Planner<T extends TimedPlanUnit>

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPlanner, ActivatePlanner, InterruptPlanner, ParameterValueChangePlanner, WaitPlanner

    public interface Planner<T extends TimedPlanUnit>
    Elckerlyc planner. Each planner can add BML behaviors to a plan and is able to resolve their unknown time constraints
    Author:
    Herwin van Welbergen

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • addBehaviour

        java.util.List<SyncAndTimePeg> addBehaviour(BMLBlockPeg bbPeg,
                                            saiba.bml.core.Behaviour b,
                                            java.util.List<TimePegAndConstraint> sac,
                                            T planElement)
                                     throws BehaviourPlanningException
        Adds a behavior to the plan. All timepegs in sac must be resolved (have time other than unknown); all TimePegs for the behavior are to be added to SyncAndTimePeg.
        Parameters:
        planElement - planElement obtained from resolveSynchs, null to create a new planElement
        Returns:
        a list of all syncs of the behavior and their linked TimePegs
        Throws:
        BehaviourPlanningException - if no behavior satisfying sac can be constructed

      • resolveSynchs

        T resolveSynchs(BMLBlockPeg bbPeg,
                saiba.bml.core.Behaviour b,
                java.util.List<TimePegAndConstraint> sac)
         throws BehaviourPlanningException
        Resolves TimePegs for behavior b, given some known time pegs and constraints
        Parameters:
        b - the behavior
        sac - the provided time pegs and constraints, missing constraints are filled out by this method
        Returns:
        the object to be placed in the plan (a TimedMotionUnit, SpeechUnit, ...)
        Throws:
        BehaviourPlanningException - if no behavior satisfying sac can be constructed

      • getSupportedBehaviours

        java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends saiba.bml.core.Behaviour>> getSupportedBehaviours()

      • getSupportedDescriptionExtensions

        java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends saiba.bml.core.Behaviour>> getSupportedDescriptionExtensions()

      • getRigidity

        double getRigidity(saiba.bml.core.Behaviour beh)
        Returns:
        0: behavior should adjust completely to the timing of other behaviors, 1:completely inflexible

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        Clean up resources constructed with the planner (e.g. for native stuff, spawned threads, ...). A planner should not be (re)used after shutting it down.
